newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: EA Generali 1996 net profit up 25.5 pct.
newsitem.headline: EA Generali 1996 net profit up 25.5 pct.

text.p: Austrian insurer EA Generali said on Friday group net profit for 1996 rose 25.5 percent and that it would pay an unchanged dividend of 17 schillings.
The insurance company said in a statement group net profit rose to 601.7 million schillings from 479.6 million in 1995.

The Italian-controlled EA Generali, which reported provisional 1996 earnings in March, attributed the earnings growth to a strong increase in life insurance income -- up 49.1 percent to 15.7 billion schillings -- as Austrians rushed to buy policies before a tax change came into effect this month.
Total group premiums hit a record high at 42.8 billion schillings, up from 36.88 billion a year earlier, with more than two thirds of the premium volume stemming from Austria.
